metadata.description: Build AI applications with vector search, RAG, and semantic search using Milvus

plugins.name: core
plugins.description: Core tools: pilot (main controller), embedding, chunking, indexing, rerank, ray, local-setup

plugins.name: rag-toolkit
plugins.description: RAG solutions: basic RAG, rerank, agentic, multi-hop

plugins.name: memory-system
plugins.description: Long-term memory for chatbots and AI assistants

plugins.name: retrieval-system
plugins.description: Text search: semantic, filtered, hybrid (BM25 + vector), multi-vector

plugins.name: multimodal-retrieval
plugins.description: Multimodal search: image, text-to-image, video, multimodal RAG
